=== Installation ===
Open your Downloadfolder.
<br>
*Unpack GProxy v2.3.2* (if you dont have winrar you can download it [http://www.winrar.de/download.php here])
<br>
[http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg713/scaled.php?server=713&filename=3ordnerentpacken.jpg&res=medium]
<br>
<br>
*Open your Gproxy v2.3.2 folder.*
<br>
<br>
*Rightclick on Gproxy 2.3.2.exe and Properties*
<br>
<br>
*Run as Administrator*
<br>
<br>
*ok*
<br>
<br>
[http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg594/scaled.php?server=594&filename=4eigenschaften.jpg&res=medium]
<br>
<br>
<br>
*Run Gproxy v2.3.2.exe*
<br>
[http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg703/scaled.php?server=703&filename=7optionenerklrung.jpg&res=medium]
<br>
*Explanation:*
<br>
<br>
*Reign of Chaos CD Key* _Your Wc3 - Reign of Chaos CD-Key_
<br>
*The Frozen Throne CD-Key* _Your Wc3 - The Frozen Throne CD-Key_
<br>
*Battle.net Server* _The server where you want to join_
<br>
*Username* _Your battle.net Account_
<br>
*Password* _Your battle.net Password_
<br>
*Channel* _Which Wc3-Channel you want start_
<br>
*War3craft 3 patch version*: _Your Wc3-Patch version_
<br>
*Port* _What port you want to use_
<br>
*Warcraft 3 Install directory* _Choose Your Warcraft 3 Install Path_
<br>
[http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg543/scaled.php?server=543&filename=6chooseyourwc3directory.jpg&res=medium]
<br>
<br>
